```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(scales)

csv <- "MELBOURNE_HOUSE_PRICES_LESS.csv"
raw <- read_csv(csv, show_col_types = FALSE)
```

```{r}
# Data Cleaning
mh <- raw %>%
mutate(
Date = suppressWarnings(lubridate::dmy(Date)),
Type = as.factor(Type),
Regionname = as.factor(Regionname),
Suburb = as.factor(Suburb),
filter(!is.na(Price)))
```
